LanguageData.MpLoadingError2: This might cause games to desync.
LanguageData.MpLoadingError3: This is likely because this version of the mod wan't made for your version of RimWorld.
LanguageData.MpLoadingError5: NOTE: the game could have updated very recently and there might not be a new version of Multiplayer available yet.
LanguageData.MpServerCloseConfirmationNoTime: Are you sure you want to close the server?
LanguageData.MpServerCloseConfirmationTime: Are you sure you want to close the server? Last saved {0} ago.
LanguageData.MpCallingFactionNotAvailable: Calling other factions is currently not available in multiplayer.
LanguageData.MpLowestWinsButtonsDesc1: Current time speed votes, lowest wins.
LanguageData.MpLowestWinsButtonsDesc3: The host can Shift+Click here to reset all votes.
LanguageData.MpWrongMultiplayerVersionDesc: The server is hosted on Multiplayer {0} (protocol {1}). Your version: {2} (protocol {3})
LanguageData.MpWrongVersionUpdateInfo: Update the mod (resubscribe if on Steam).
LanguageData.MpWrongVersionUpdateInfoHost: The host should update the mod (resubscribe if on Steam).
LanguageData.MpPacketErrorLocal: Local packet read error. See the log for more info.
LanguageData.MpPacketErrorRemote: Remote packet read error. The host can view the log for more info.
LanguageData.MpChangeUsernameInfo: You can change your username in the mod settings.
LanguageData.MpConvertToSpWarnHost: Are you sure you want to convert to singleplayer? This will close the server.
LanguageData.MpConvertToSpWarn: Are you sure you want to convert to singleplayer? You will leave the multiplayer game.
LanguageData.MpGameSaveFailed: Failed to save the game. See the log for more info.
LanguageData.MpAutoAcceptSteamDesc: Automatically accept any incoming Steam connection requests.
LanguageData.MpAutosaveSlotsDesc: How many autosave files to keep.
LanguageData.MpAggressiveTickingDesc: Always try to automatically catch up with the server at the cost of FPS.
LanguageData.MpShowModCompatDesc: Enables downloading and displaying of crowd-sourced mod compatibility info.
LanguageData.MpSettingsPageColorDesc: Select what colors player get when they connect to a game you host. Affects, for example, player cursors.
LanguageData.MpAlertPingDesc1: Click to focus the camera on locations pinged by: {0}
LanguageData.MpAnotherRitualInProgress: Another ritual setup session is already in progress.
LanguageData.MpSteamConnectingTo: Connecting to a game hosted by {0}
LanguageData.MpDesyncedWaiting: Waiting for data from the host
LanguageData.MpHostDirectDesc1: Listen for joining players on specified endpoints.
LanguageData.MpHostDirectDesc2: Usually, leaving this field 0.0.0.0 is enough (it means listen on all network interfaces). Note that you'll likely have to do port forwarding.
LanguageData.MpHostDirectDesc3: To listen on multiple endpoints, separate them with ampersands. IPv6 addresses are supported.
LanguageData.MpHostDirectDesc4: When no port is provided, 30502 is used.
LanguageData.MpAutosavesDesc2: Click the unit to switch between ingame days and realtime minutes.
LanguageData.MpAutosavesDesc3: A day on normal speed is about 16.6 minutes (fast: 5.5 minutes, superfast: 2.7 minutes)
LanguageData.MpLanDesc1: Broadcast the game to your local network.
LanguageData.MpArbiterDesc: A background game instance which helps with desync detection/solving.
LanguageData.MpAsyncTimeDesc: Separate time controls for each map and the planet.
LanguageData.MpHostingDevModeDesc1: Enables access to RimWorld's development mode tools.
LanguageData.MpHostingDevModeDesc2: Note: not all dev tools are usable and no support is provided for them.
LanguageData.MpLogDesyncTracesDesc1: Log extra stacktraces for troubleshooting desyncs.
LanguageData.MpLogDesyncTracesDesc2: Does not work on 32 bit and ARM (Apple Silicon) processors.
LanguageData.MpSyncConfigsDescNew1: Toggle whether joining players can download your mod configuration files.
LanguageData.MpSyncConfigsDescNew2: Enabling this can reduce the number of desyncs.
LanguageData.MpSyncConfigsDescNew3: Note that some mods' config files can contain sensitive information (like Twitch API tokens used by streamer mods).
LanguageData.MpAutoJoinPointsDesc2: Join-point creation is slower than saving but it speeds up joining significantly by not requiring players to simulate the game.
LanguageData.MpAutoJoinPointsDesc3: You can always create a join-point manually by typing /joinpoint in the chat.
LanguageData.MpCompatibilityButtonDesc2: Also available from the mod list.
LanguageData.MpActiveConfigsButtonDesc1: This RimWorld instance has been started with configuration files from game: {0}
LanguageData.MpActiveConfigsButtonDesc2: Restart to restore your previous configs.
LanguageData.MpSaveOutdatedDesc: This savefile was made with RimWorld {0} but you are running version {1}.
LanguageData.MpNoSaves: Multiplayer can only be played from already existing saves
LanguageData.MpMismatchDefsDiff: Mod data definitions differ. They need to match before joining.
LanguageData.MpRestartNeeded: The game needs to be restarted for mod list, file and config changes to take effect.
LanguageData.MpApplyConfigsTip: The application of configs is temporary and lasts until the next game restart. None of your files will be overriden.
LanguageData.MpApplyModListTip: Your current mod list will get overriden.
LanguageData.MpMismatchSeeTabs: See the respective tabs for more info.
LanguageData.MpMismatchRestartDesc: You will be reconnected after the game finishes loading.
LanguageData.MpMismatchModListsMismatch: Mod lists differ. The game needs to be restarted.
LanguageData.MpMismatchWrongOrder: Mods match but their order doesn't. The game needs to be restarted.
LanguageData.MpMismatchSubscribeMsg: Subscribed to {0} mods. Downloading in the background...
LanguageData.MpMismatchSubscribeNoSteam: Not connected to Steam. Missing mods have to be installed manually.
LanguageData.MpMismatchSubscribeDesc1: Subscribe to the missing mods on the Steam Workshop. Downloading will happen in the background.
LanguageData.MpMismatchSubscribeDesc2: Not all of the missing mods are available on Steam. The rest have to be installed manually.
LanguageData.MpMismatchFilesInfo: Mod file differences need to be resolved manually or ignored. They are usually caused by differing versions of mods or files being left behind after an update.
LanguageData.MpMismatchFilesInfoMods: You should try to update/reinstall the offending mods (or resubscribe if on Steam).
LanguageData.MpMismatchFilesInfoCore: To resolve issues with Core and expansion files, remove their folders and revalidate game file integrity (safe to do so, user data is stored elsewhere). Hover over the topmost folders to see their paths.
LanguageData.MpMismatchFilesInfoHost: The differences might originate on the host side and they might have to repeat the above steps.
LanguageData.MpMismatchFileShowPath: Hold shift to show the folder path.
LanguageData.MpMismatchFileOpenPath: Shift + click to open the folder.
LanguageData.MpConfigSyncDisabled: Config sync disabled by the host
LanguageData.MpModCompatXmlOnlyDesc: XML-only mods provide only data and no logic and so are always compatible. Note though that they can have incompatible mods as dependencies.
LanguageData.MpModCompatScore3: Mostly works, some minor features don't work
LanguageData.MpModCompatScore2: Partially works, but major features don't work
LanguageData.MpModCompatScoreUnk: Unknown; please report findings to #mod-report in our Discord
